name: OneScreen Wagons
description: Multiplayer snakes with bonuses, colorful wagons, rocks, tunnels, swamps, people, team game and lots of fun.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: Dual Core AMD or Intel Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Quad-Core AMD or Intel Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 650 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
